channel.title: Lambda on my tech ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Lambda on my tech ramblings

item.title: 5 ways to deploy a .NET Lambda using AWS CDK
item.description: This post is going to walk you through 5 different ways to deploy a .NET lambda using AWS CDK.

item.title: How to notify AWS events to Microsoft Teams using AWS EventBridge and AWS Lambda
item.description: An AWS event indicates a change in a service, and in this post I want to show you how you can notify those events to a Microsoft Teams channel using AWS EventBridge and AWS Lambda.
